item.title: 警方正在调查一名 8 岁女童的死亡事件，当局称该女童在休斯顿一家酒店游泳时显然被吸进了一根管道，随后溺水身亡：
item.description:
Police are investigating the death of an 8-year-old girl who authorities say drowned after apparently being sucked into a pipe while swimming at a hotel in Houston.

Learn more: https://t.co/PsxULtiTCE pic.twitter.com/sH3QP3pEvU

— ABC News (@ABC) March 27, 2024

item.title: 哥伦比亚当局称，他们在一批运往欧洲的鳄梨中查获了约 1.7 吨可卡因。
item.description:
Authorities in Colombia say they seized about 1.7 tons of cocaine concealed inside a shipment of avocados bound for Europe. https://t.co/FOECnjOoFW pic.twitter.com/xNyhFYSAmA

— ABC News (@ABC) March 27, 2024

item.title: Trader Joe's（乔氏超市）的香蕉曾以每根 19 美分的价格出售而闻名，该零售商的一位代表证实，现在每根香蕉的价格将上涨到 23 美分。
item.description:
Prices on bananas at Trader Joe's that famously sold for just 19 cents a piece will now increase to 23 cents per banana, a representative from the retailer confirmed. https://t.co/FBYmoYZqwz

— ABC News (@ABC) March 27, 2024

item.title: 在前男友肖恩-"迪迪"-康布斯（Sean "Diddy" Combs）在洛杉矶和迈阿密的住所遭到联邦特工突袭的消息传出后，卡桑德拉-"卡西"-文图拉（Cassandra "Cassie" Ventura）通过其律师发表了一份声明：
item.description:
Cassandra “Cassie” Ventura is speaking out via a statement by her attorney following news that ex Sean “Diddy” Combs’ Los Angeles and Miami homes were raided by federal agents.

Read more: https://t.co/k3HNNeBIEo pic.twitter.com/9re2JDrn0B

— ABC News (@ABC) March 27, 2024

item.title: 一位专家说，人工智能生成的头像提供了新的表达形式--但这也引发了一些问题，即这些有影响力的头像可能被用来操纵追随者或传播错误信息。
item.description:
AI-generated avatars are offering new forms of expression — but it also raises questions about the possible use of the influencers to manipulate followers or spread misinformation, an expert says. https://t.co/IX6IgNR5Al

— ABC News (@ABC) March 27, 2024

item.title: 华盛顿特区有一棵绰号 "矮墩墩"（Stumpy）的樱花树，今年是它最后一次开花--在从潮汐盆地移走之前，它受到了广泛关注。
item.description:
A hallowed-out cherry blossom tree nicknamed Stumpy in Washington, D.C., is having its last bloom this year — and is getting a major amount of attention ahead of its removal from the Tidal Basin. https://t.co/MBR5trj5Vd

— ABC News (@ABC) March 27, 2024

item.title: 官方称，至少有六人下落不明。
item.description:
BREAKING: Coast Guard officials announce suspension of active search and rescue effort after Francis Scott Key Bridge collapse.

At least six people are unaccounted for, officials say. https://t.co/uHJNpPdxnk pic.twitter.com/9iKS0YN4k2

item.title: 美国公民自由联盟（ACLU）、俄亥俄州公民自由联盟（ACLU of Ohio）和 Goodwin 律师事务所周二提起诉讼，对俄亥俄州禁止为变性未成年人提供性别确认医疗服务并禁止变性女童参加女童和妇女体育运动的第 68 号众议院法案提出质疑。
item.description:
The ACLU, ACLU of Ohio, and Goodwin law firm filed a lawsuit Tuesday challenging House Bill 68, legislation in Ohio that bans gender-affirming medical care for trans minors, and also bans transgender girls from taking part in girls' and women's sports.https://t.co/GpbbMA6LVn pic.twitter.com/mIwwIv9rcy

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 官方称，至少有六人下落不明。

item.title: 俄罗斯法院周二将《世界日报》记者埃文-格什科维奇（Evan Gershkovich）的审前拘留期至少延长至 6 月 30 日。该记者于 2023 年 3 月在叶卡捷琳堡市采访时被俄罗斯情报机构联邦安全局逮捕。
item.description:
A Russian court on Tuesday extended WSJ reporter Evan Gershkovich's pre-trial detention until at least June 30.

The journalist was arrested in March 2023 by Russian intelligence agency, FSB, while on a reporting trip to the city of Yekaterinburg. https://t.co/KcBgHjMXBo pic.twitter.com/YXNZBrWscV

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 就在得克萨斯州总检察长肯-帕克斯顿（Ken Paxton）即将就他否认的一桩长达九年之久的证券欺诈案出庭受审的几周前，检察官周二同意在一定条件下撤销指控。
item.description:
Just weeks before Texas Attorney General Ken Paxton was set to face trial in a nine-year-old securities fraud case that he denies, prosecutors on Tuesday agreed to drop the charges on certain conditions. https://t.co/z8fu17p5ea

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 肖恩-"迪迪"-康姆斯（Sean "Diddy" Combs）的一名律师对周一在其洛杉矶和迈阿密住所进行的突袭做出了回应。在周二发表的一份声明中，康姆斯的律师亚伦-戴尔（Aaron Dyer）称搜查令是 "前所未有的伏击 "和 "猎巫"。
item.description:
An attorney for Sean "Diddy" Combs has responded to the raids that took place at his Los Angeles and Miami homes Monday.

In a statement issued Tuesday, Combs' attorney, Aaron Dyer, called the search warrants an "unprecedented ambush" and a "witch hunt." https://t.co/wxGwV2YiLs pic.twitter.com/sVl76LOKH8

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 美国公民自由联盟（ACLU）、俄亥俄州公民自由联盟（ACLU of Ohio）和 Goodwin 律师事务所周二提起诉讼，对俄亥俄州禁止为变性未成年人提供性别确认医疗服务并禁止变性女童参加女童和妇女体育运动的第 68 号众议院法案提出质疑。

item.title: 根据一份新的法庭文件，一名犹他州妇女被指控用致命剂量的芬太尼杀死了自己的丈夫，现在她在这起案件中面临更多指控，其中包括因涉嫌在丈夫死前一个月投毒而企图实施严重谋杀。
item.description:
A Utah woman accused of killing her husband with a lethal dose of fentanyl now faces more charges in the case — including attempted aggravated murder for allegedly poisoning him a month before he died, according to a new court filing.https://t.co/xeyHkAoHHr pic.twitter.com/Zx2n25pMrW

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.description:

item.title: 最高法院听取了对美国食品药品管理局（FDA）管制米非司酮的质疑，米非司酮是一种广泛用于药物流产的药物。以下是大约两个小时的辩论中的五大要点：
item.description:
The Supreme Court heard a challenge to the FDA's regulation of mifepristone, a widely used drug used in medication abortions.

Here are five key takeaways from the roughly two hours of arguments: https://t.co/u2kJoonWkV

item.title: 周二，国防部长奥斯汀会见了以色列国防部长加兰特--就在此前一天，以色列总理内塔尼亚胡取消了将赴美讨论拉法行动计划的代表团。
item.description:
Defense Sec. Austin met with Israeli Defense Minister Gallant on Tuesday — a day after Israeli Prime Minister Netanyahu canceled the delegation to the U.S. that was going to discuss plans for an operation in Rafah. https://t.co/mBfvks61Oy

item.title: 在关于限制堕胎药米非司酮的辩论中，人们引用了一项有 151 年历史的法律，即 1873 年的《康斯托克法案》，根据该法案，利用运输工具邮寄 "淫秽 "材料是非法的：
item.description:
Being cited in the debate over restrictions on the abortion pill mifepristone is a 151-year-old law, the Comstock Act of 1873, under which it's illegal to use carriers to mail "obscene" materials.

Here's what to know: https://t.co/Gd2Th0xTGC

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 在上周的开奖中无人中奖后，"百万大奖 "的头奖奖金已增至 11.2 亿美元。
item.description:
The Mega Millions jackpot has swelled to $1.12 billion after nobody won last week's drawing.

If a winner hits Tuesday night's jackpot, this would be the fifth-largest prize in the history of the game. https://t.co/vwu7faqINR pic.twitter.com/fuJxr0L08j

item.title: 马里兰州州长韦斯-摩尔（Wes Moore）在被问及弗朗西斯-斯科特-基大桥坍塌时是否有车辆时说："目前仍在进行调查。
item.description:
Asked whether there were vehicles on the Francis Scott Key Bridge when it collapsed, Maryland Gov. Wes Moore says "there is still an investigation going on."

At least six people remain unaccounted for, officials say. https://t.co/qa2QDcz2rZ pic.twitter.com/Pioxdh12CY

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 马里兰州州长韦斯-摩尔（Wes Moore）在周二下午的新闻发布会上说，巴尔的摩弗朗西斯-斯科特-基大桥垮塌 14 小时后，工作人员仍在拼命寻找仍下落不明的六人。
item.description:
Fourteen hours after the collapse of Baltimore's Francis Scott Key Bridge, crews are still desperately looking for the six people who remain unaccounted for, Maryland Gov. Wes Moore said at a news conference Tuesday afternoon. https://t.co/zc0OAmUHAg pic.twitter.com/C219t5fKPR

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 伊利诺伊州州长普利兹克宣布，假释委员会主席和成员辞职，他们负责监督一名被控刺伤前女友并杀害其子、11 岁的杰登-珀金斯（Jayden Perkins）的男子的假释。
item.description:
Illinois Gov. Pritzker has announced the resignation of the parole board chair and member who oversaw parole for a man accused of stabbing an-ex-girlfriend and killing her son, 11-year-old Jayden Perkins. https://t.co/laGqlE7Z75

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 海岸警卫队官员说，在弗朗西斯-斯科特-基大桥垮塌现场的紧急搜寻工作仍在继续，仍有六人下落不明。马里兰州州长韦斯-摩尔（Wes Moore）说，坍塌发生时，工人们正在桥上修补坑洞。
item.description:
Six people remain unaccounted for as the desperate search continues at the site of the Francis Scott Key Bridge collapse, Coast Guard officials said. Workers were on the bridge working on potholes at the time of the collapse, Maryland Gov. Wes Moore said. https://t.co/jHtm617UkH pic.twitter.com/FAj5rlpQgi

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 挂牌显示，这艘悬挂新加坡国旗的货轮名为 "Dali"，长 984 英尺，宽 157 英尺。船上有 22 名船员，他们都在印度工作。以下是关于这艘撞向巴尔的摩大桥的巨轮的信息：
item.description:
The Singapore-flagged cargo ship, Dali, spans a length of 984 feet and a width of 157 feet, a listing showed. It holds 22 crew members, all of whom are based in India.

Here's what to know about the massive ship that crashed into the Baltimore bridge: https://t.co/DMT3H3bsen

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024
